price: Kò sí ẹnì kan nínú àwa (mọlāika) àfi kí ó ní ibùdúró tí wọ́n ti mọ̀.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
